name: Spring Roll Vinaigrette
keywords: garlic, ginger, honey, jalapeño, lemon juice, meat broth, plum wine, port, red wine, rice wine vinegar, scallion, soy sauce
recipeIngredient: 2 cups rich meat broth, homemade or low-sodium canned

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the first 10 ingredients in a small saucepan. Simmer over medium heat until reduced to 1/4 cup, about 30 minutes. Add the meat broth and continue to simmer until mixture reduces to 2 cups, about 5 to 10 minutes. Remove from heat.
Add the scallions, ginger, honey and lemon juice. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Serve with spring rolls (above).
